content: lion brand pattern # chs-8afghans skill level intermediate level 3 homespun® article #790 2 colors 3 balls each 6 balls total crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm gauge each square = approx 6 4 in x 6 4 in each section = approx 12 in x 12 in 48 basic squares seamed together with a crochet border the basic square for this blanket half dark half light can be arranged into eight different quilt patterns center diamond diagonals diamond flying geese paving river sharks teeth windmill
